'''Yuan Cheng''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[World Quest]] ''[[The Tree who Stands Alone]].''

He is the son of the late [[Yuan Hong]] and the younger brother of the late [[Yuan Qing]] and [[Yuan Liang]].

===Appearance===
Yuan Cheng is a muscular man with short black hair. At the time of his death, he was wearing loose brown pants, a brown tee, and a beige vest on top. He was also wearing bandages on both his ankles and dark brown shoes. He appears as a ghost.
